page.title: 19MR SCOTT, NEW ENGLAND FARM
page.content: Mr. Scott has lived and worked on New England Farm for many years. He is a local gentleman having been born in Swaffham Bulbeck on 9th. January 1899. He is very active for his 86 years. He could remember going to school but also having to work very hard from a very early age. To travel then one had to go by foot or by bicycle if you were lucky enough to have one. Mr. Scott told us about the days he started to learn to drive in his early twenties and he did not have to have a test. The driving test has reached 50 years but Mr. Scott has been driving longer than that and still makes trips to the Norfolk coast with his wife. He got married on November 26th. 1926 and went to live with his wife in the cottage at New England Farm some thirteen years later. They are now looking for a bungalow to live in.
